\documentclass[varwidth=true,border=50pt]{standalone}

\usepackage{amsfonts,fancyhdr,graphicx,mathtools,microtype,seqsplit,
            subcaption}

\begin{document}

\noindent \includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{le_roi_le_veult}

\vspace{10pt}

\textit{By His Majesty's command, and by virtue of the authority given me by the same, I, The Honourable \textbf{The Chancellor of Cyprus}, declare as follows:}\\

This is the first Ordinance issued by my office. This Ordinance, and all future Ordinances, until an Ordinance is issued by this office to the contrary, is and will be verified by the \textbf{SHA256} algorithm and the \textbf{public key} in the attached annexe.\\

\textit{In witness of the above, this shall be sufficient warrant.}

\vspace{20pt}
